 I. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָכַר‎</span>] **verb** (not **Qal**) ==regard, recognize== (Late Hebrew Hiph\`il ***know, be acquainted with***; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] Aph\`el ***id.***; Syriac Aph\`el <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; compare also Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in sense ***be shrewd, cunning***); **\*\***Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be shrewd***, apparently rare, compare <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***cunning*** Lane<sup>2850 a</sup>. — 

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִכְּרוּ‎</span> [[Lam.4.8|Lam 4:8]] ***they are not recognized***. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא נִכַּר שׁוֺע לִפְנֵידָֿ֑ל‎</span> [[Job.34.19|Job 34:19]] ***he regardeth not the opulent above the poor*** (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹאנָֿשָׂא פְּנֵי שָׂרִים‎</span>); ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא תְנַכֵּ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Job.21.29|Job 21:29]] ***do ye not recognize their tokens***. **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכִּיר‎</span> [[Deut.33.9|Deut 33:9]]; [[Dan.11.39|Dan 11:39]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]]; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכִּירוֺ‎</span> [[Gen.27.23|Gen 27:23]] 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכִּירוּ‎</span> [[Judg.18.3|Judg 18:3]] + 2 t., suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכִּירֻהוּ‎</span> [[Job.2.12|Job 2:12]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכִּרֻהוּ‎</span> [[Gen.42.8|Gen 42:8]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַכִּיר‎</span> [[Deut.21.17|Deut 21:17]] + 3 t. + [[Dan.11.39|Dan 11:39]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּכֵּר‎</span> [[Gen.38.26|Gen 38:26]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּכִּרֵ֫הוּ‎</span> [[1Kgs.18.7|1Kgs 18:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַכִּירֶ֫נּוּ‎</span> [[Job.7.10|Job 7:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּכִּירָהּ‎</span> [[Gen.37.33|Gen 37:33]], etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ַהכֶּרֿ‎</span> [[Gen.31.32|Gen 31:32]] + 2 t.; ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵַכּרֿ‎</span> ([[BDB#Gi|Ginsb]] [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ַהכֶּרֿ‎</span>) [[Prov.24.23|Prov 24:23]]; [[Prov.28.21|Prov 28:21]] ***construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַכִּירֵנִי‎</span> [[Ruth.2.10|Ruth 2:10]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַכִּיר‎</span> [[Ps.142.5|Ps 142:5]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַכִּירֵךְ‎</span> [[Ruth.2.19|Ruth 2:19]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***regard, observe***, especially with a view to recognition, with object clause, [[Gen.31.32|Gen 31:32]]; [[Gen.37.32|Gen 37:32]]; [[Gen.38.25|Gen 38:25]] ***pay attention to***, with accusative of person [[Ruth.2.10|Ruth 2:10]]; [[Ruth.2.19|Ruth 2:19]] accusative of thing (of God) [[Job.34.25|Job 34:25]] accusative of thing omitted [[2Sam.3.36|2Sam 3:36]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֵּן אַכִּיר ֗֗֗ לְטוֺבָה‎</span> [[Jer.24.5|Jer 24:5]] ***so will I regard*** the exiles ... ***for good***; Antiochus subject [[Dan.11.39|Dan 11:39]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכִּיר פָּנִים‎</span> ***pay regard to*** (shew partiality, = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׂא פְּנֵי פ‎</span>) [[Deut.1.17|Deut 1:17]]; [[Deut.16.19|Deut 16:19]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִטָּה מִשְׁפָּט‎</span>), [[Prov.24.23|Prov 24:23]]; [[Prov.28.21|Prov 28:21]].


**2.** ***Recognize*** (as formerly known) with accusative of person or thing, [[Gen.27.23|Gen 27:23]]; [[Gen.37.33|Gen 37:33]]; [[Gen.38.26|Gen 38:26]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Gen.42.7|Gen 42:7]]; [[Gen.42.8|Gen 42:8]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Kgs.18.7|1Kgs 18:7]]; [[1Kgs.20.41|1Kgs 20:41]]; [[Job.2.12|Job 2:12]] proverb. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּטֶרֶם יַכִּיר אִישׁ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתרֵֿעֵהוּ‎</span> [[Ruth.3.14|Ruth 3:14]] ***before a man could recognize his fellow*** (i.e. before dawn); ***recognize*** voice (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺל‎</span>), [[Judg.18.3|Judg 18:3]]; [[1Sam.26.17|1Sam 26:17]] = ***perceive*** the true situation, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וָאַכִּירָה וְהִנֵּה‎</span> [[Neh.6.12|Neh 6:12]] ***and I perceived, and lo!*** God had not sent him.


**3.** ***Be willing to recognize, acknowledge*** [[Deut.21.17|Deut 21:17]]; [[Deut.33.9|Deut 33:9]]; [[Isa.63.16|Isa 63:16]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָדַע‎</span>), [[Ps.142.5|Ps 142:5]] ***acknowledge with honour*** [[Isa.61.9|Isa 61:9]].


**4.** ***Be acquainted with***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא יַכִּירֶנּוּ עוֺד מְקוֺמוֺ‎</span> [[Job.7.10|Job 7:10]] ***his place shall be acquainted with him no more*** (he shall be gone and forgotten), compare [[Ps.103.16|Ps 103:16]] with accusative of thing [[Job.24.17|Job 24:17]].


**5.** ***Distinguish, understand***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכִּיר קוֺל ֗֗֗ לְקוֺל‎</span> [[Ezra.3.13|Ezra 3:13]] ***could not distinguish***, etc.; compare [[Job.4.16|Job 4:16]] ***could not distinguish its appearance***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִכִּיר לְדַבֵּר‎</span> [[Neh.13.24|Neh 13:24]] ***understand*** how to ***speak***, etc.

**Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִתְנַכֶּרנָֿ֑עַר‎</span> [[Prov.20.11|Prov 20:11]] by his deeds ***a youth maketh himself known***, whether his doing be pure, etc. 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נכר‎</span>] **verbdenominative** ==act or treat as foreign, or strange; disguise, misconstrue==; — 

**Niph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָּכֵר‎</span> [[Prov.26.24|Prov 26:24]] with his lips a hater ***disguiseth himself*** (dissembles, speaks what is ***foreign*** to his thought). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִכַּר‎</span> [[1Sam.23.7|1Sam 23:7]], but see below; ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְנַכְּרוּ‎</span> [[Jer.19.4|Jer 19:4]] ***and they have treated*** this place ***as foreign*** (profane); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַכְּרוּ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָרֵהוּ‎</span> [[Deut.32.27|Deut 32:27]] lest ***their adversaries should misconstrue*** (it). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּיָדִי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִכַּר אֹתוֺ א‎</span> [[1Sam.23.7|1Sam 23:7]] ***God hath alienated him into my hand***, but improbable; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָכַר‎</span> (compare [[Judg.4.9|Judg 4:9]]) ***hath sold him***, so [[BDB#The|Th]] [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] (compare [[BDB#We|We]]); &lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִכַּר‎</span> (as [[Isa.19.4|Isa 19:4]]) [[BDB#Krochm|Krochm]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]; [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] either of these; &gt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִגַּר‎</span> [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]; Löhr either <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִגַּר‎</span> or <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סִכַּר‎</span>. **Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּתְנַכֵּר אֲלֵיהֶם‎</span> [[Gen.42.7|Gen 42:7]] ***he acted as a stranger toward them; Participle*** feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְנַכֵּרָ֑ה‎</span> [[1Kgs.14.5|1Kgs 14:5]]; [[1Kgs.14.6|1Kgs 14:6]] ***feign to be a stranger-woman***.
